name: Beat Em Shmup
description:
Can the valiant™, good-hearted™ and loveable™ protagonist Shmup defeat the evil Em comglomerate?  Mixes pewy-pewy shmups and punchy-punchy Beat 'em ups for Ludum Dare 41.

Controls for Windows/HTML5:

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - Escape
  • Select - A/RETURN
  • Punch Left - A
  • Punch Right - S
  • Movement - Arrow keys

Controls for Dreamcast:

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - A+B+X+Y+START (Standard Dreamcast return to title combo)
  • Select - A/START
  • Punch Left - A
  • Punch Right - B
  • Movement - D-Pad

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 23/04/2018
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/BeatEmShmup/
  • Twitter is here: http://twitter.com/CaptDreamcast

Thanks for playing!
